fullplot: Superintendent Jane Tennison, on loan to another jurisdiction, is sent in to investigate a murder of a businessman. It looks like a fairly obvious sex murder, but the facts prove otherwise. Now as Tennison investigates, she uncovers the crime's link to the goings on with the local municipal government and finds something larger and darker there than she anticipated.
plot: A seemingly straightforward sex murder investigation by Superintendent Jane Tennison leads to a hidden political scandal.
title: Prime Suspect: Inner Circles
